software.name: elog
software.custom_start_script:
PID_FILE=/tmp/pid
export PID_FILE
. /home/trap.sh
 if ! test -d /home/fs/config_and_data/log_books
 then
mkdir -p /home/fs/config_and_data/log_books
cp /home/app/password_file.xml /home/fs/config_and_data/password_file.xml
cp /home/app/elogd.cfg.build /home/fs/config_and_data/elogd.cfg
fi
/usr/local/sbin/elogd -c /home/fs/config_and_data/elogd.cfg -f /tmp/pid -d /home/fs/config_and_data/logbooks -v 2 -p 8000 >/var/log/elog.log &

touch /engines/var/run/flags/startup_complete

wait
rm /engines/var/run/flags/startup_complete

exit
software.custom_install_script:
cd /home/app/src
echo "Building"
env ROOT=/home/app PREFIX=/../local HAVE_SSL=1 make  >& /tmp/err
if test $? -ne 0
   then 
     tail -40 /tmp/err
     echo "Build Failed"
     exit
  else

    echo Build Sucessful

 fi
env ROOT=/home/app PREFIX=/../local HAVE_SSL=0 make install  >& /tmp/err
if test $? -ne 0
   then 
     tail -40 /tmp/err
     echo "Build Failed"
     exit
  else
$crypt=`echo $admin_password | sha256sum |cut -f 1 -d" "`
cat /home/app/password_file.xml.build | sed "/PASSWORD/s//$crypt/" > /home/app/password_file.xml
    echo Install Sucessful

 fi

template_files.title: elogd.cfg.build
template_files.content:
[global]
port = 8080
SMTP host = _Engines_System(smtp_host)
URL = _Engines_Builder(http_protocol)://_Engines_Builder(fqdn)/
Password file = /home/fs/config_and_data/password_file.xml

[demo]
Theme = default
Comment = Demo Log edit to customise
Attributes = Author, Type, Category, Subject
Options Type = Routine, Software Installation, Problem Fixed, Configuration, Other
Options Category = General, Hardware, Software, Network, Other
Extendable Options = Category
Required Attributes = Author, Type
Page Title = ELOG - $subject
Reverse sort = 1
Quick filter = Date, Type
